house_listing.house_description: Exciting new project offers spacious floor plans with terrific views of city marina and lynn.River. The 24 unit complex offers covered parking, elevator, huge assigned storage, 9'ceil,private patios, wide hallways, & 2/3 bdrm floor plans.
